QuestData.Title: Iron Horde Invasion
QuestData.Description: All able bodied members of the Horde are hereby ordered to report to Thrall in Blasted Lands.$B$BUse the portal at the Cleft of Shadow in Orgrimmar to head directly to the front line.$b$bThis new threat is known only as the Iron Horde. They have taken over the Dark Portal and must be stopped$B$BDestiny calls!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Thrall at the Shattered Landing in Blasted Lands.
QuestData.RewardText: The situation here is dire, $n. We have much to discuss.
